Package com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool

Class PoolGameDisplay

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.rendering.RenderComponent
com.csse3200.game.ui.UIComponent
com.csse3200.game.components.minigames.pool.PoolGameDisplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Renderable, Comparable<Renderable>
public class PoolGameDisplay extends UIComponent
The main UI component for the Pool minigame.

This class renders the pool table, HUD, and player controls, and connects user inputs (e.g., aiming and shooting) to the game’s PoolGameDisplay.Controller interface.

Presentation-only: all physics and logic interactions are routed through the controller or triggered events.

    static interface 
    PoolGameDisplay.Controller
    Controller is the only way the UI queries physics/world.
